entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 120 in the Wreckhouse area this evening. Wind becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 late this evening. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
